item.title: Understanding Apache Kafka: An Introduction
item.description: Apache Kafka is an open-source stream-processing software platform developed by Linkedin and donated to the Apache Software Foundation.

item.title: Kafka Consumer Groups and replications factor
item.description: Kafka Consumer Group: A Brief Explanation A Kafka Consumer Group is, at its core, a way of allowing a pool of consumers to divide the processing of data over multiple consumer instances, each of which is called a consumer.

item.title: Kafka Introduction
item.description: I hope you like these articles explaining all you need to know to get the Confluent Kafka Developer Certification.
